column5: Hi Everyone Looking to go do some ice fishing in Ontario for Perch & Walleye!  Has anyone gone there recently?  Looking for resort or lodge on a lake (where perch & walleye fishing are good).  Any recommendations on a four season resort!  Any help would be appreciated!  Thanks Jenerous
Ontario's a pretty big place jenerous, perhaps if you specify which area your interested in, it'll help the members come up with some ideas for you.  Wherever you end up though, have a great trip !!

I will bite. Both examples are based upon your stated interest in walleye and yellow perch.  I would suggest Nippissing, given that it has both species plus whitefish and a variety of accomodations.  If you want larger walleye, the Bay of Quinte is the #1 choice. There is no place that I can suggest that would have an outstanding lodge, with a couple of bed and breakfasts being as close as it gets.  Both suggestions have various guides, etc.  outdoorguy61
Hi Jenerous; one thing to remember is the season for walleye ends in some areas the end of Feb. and March 15th in most other locations. If you are making reservations, do it soon. Good luck. Tom
